com.ibm.team.process.common
Interface IAddition

public interface IAddition

Represents the addition child of an add-element within a configuration-data-delta element.

Since:
4.0.1

Nested Class Summary
static class IAddition.Location
          Represents the specific location of this addition relative to the path specified in add-element.
 
Method Summary
 java.util.List getElementsToBeAdded()
          Get the list of IProcessConfigurationElement that the containing delta adds to configuration data
 IAddition.Location getLocation()
          Get the specific location of this addition relative to the path specified in the add-element.
 int getMergeDepth()
          Get the merge depth of this addition.
 

Method Detail

getElementsToBeAdded

java.util.List getElementsToBeAdded()
Get the list of IProcessConfigurationElement that the containing delta adds to configuration data

Returns:
List of IProcessConfigurationElement, may be empty but not null.

getMergeDepth

int getMergeDepth()
Get the merge depth of this addition. If no merge depth was specified explicitly, the default of 0 will be returned. If the merge depth is unlimited, then -1 will be returned. If the merge depth attribute cannot be parsed, then Integer.MIN_VALUE will be returned.

Returns:
The merge depth of this addition, with -1 used to represent unlimited merging.

getLocation

IAddition.Location getLocation()
Get the specific location of this addition relative to the path specified in the add-element. If no location was explicitly specified, the default of last-child will be returned.

Returns:
The specific location of this addition relative to the path, or Location.UNKNOWN if the attribute cannot be parsed.
